data.name: Warface – Vibrant Pack
data.detailed_description:
This package contains the following items:


  • IMBEL IA2 + Vibrant camo

  • Kel-Tec Shotgun + Vibrant camo

  • SR-2 Veresk + Vibrant camo

  • CheyTac M200 + Vibrant camo

  • Rifleman of the "Aurora" squad body camo

  • Medic of the "Aurora" squad

  • Engineer of the "Aurora" squad

  • Sniper of the "Aurora" squad

This pack offers a delicious assortment of weapons and body camo - one per game's class. Grab "Vibrant" weapons, dress to kill and shine like a true aurora!

MORE ABOUT THE WEAPONS:


Assault rifle – IMBEL IA2. The original rifle was officially deployed in the Brazilian army as a replacement for the outdated FN FAL and M16A2 rifles. Its advantages include the universal STANAG magazine, high power and durability, good accuracy at long ranges and reliability in extreme conditions.

Shotgun - Kel-Tec. Kel-Tec is a bullpup pump-action shotgun. It was developed by private US-based arms-making company Kel-tec CNC Industries, which is known for their innovative products.

Submachine gun - SR-2 Veresk. SR-2 Veresk submachine gun was developed by the Central Scientific-Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering. It is the first submachine gun to fire powerful 9x21 armor piercing ammunition.

Sniper rifle - CheyTac M200. Fed from a detachable single stack magazine holding 7 rounds, CheyTac M200 covers ranges unequalled by most modern-day sniper rifles. It is a bolt-action weapon for long-range combat, manufactured in America.

MORE ABOUT THE BODY CAMO:


Aurora squad members are as beautiful and deadly as the dawn on Venus. They are a truly threatening combat unit in battle thanks to their agility, reflexes and expertise. Perfect for any secret mission.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT 256MB / AMD ATI Radeon X1950 256MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo E6-series / Athlon64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT 512MB / AMD Radeon HD 4830 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
